scripts.fuzz-uci: $npm_execpath run compile && node node_modules/@gitlab-org/jsfuzz dist/uci.fuzz.js corpus/uci
scripts.fuzz-fen: $npm_execpath run compile && node node_modules/@gitlab-org/jsfuzz dist/fen.fuzz.js corpus/fen
scripts.fuzz-pgn: $npm_execpath run compile && node node_modules/@gitlab-org/jsfuzz dist/pgn.fuzz.js corpus/pgn
